comments.text:
Want a FREE SKINOMI PROTECTOR for this device? (For skeptics: it's not a scam) 
Follow these 5 steps: 
1.)﻿ Look up "skinomi-forums" on Google, and click the first link that shows up
2.) Sign up for a FREE account
3.) Look under the "other" thread category,﻿ and search for the thread that has "[OFFICIAL] Acer Iconia Tab A200 Contest + Skin Design Diagrams " as the header
4.) Read the rules of the contest, and enter the contest!
5.) Follow us @skinomi on twitter and/or "like" us on facebook!
comments.author: SkinomiDesignSS
